gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `PropertyPlantEquipment` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `PropertyPlantEquipment` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` SHOULD NOT be reported, because `PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_PropertyPlantEquipment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_PropertyPlantEquipment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPropertyPlantEquipmentTangibleAssetsOtherMovementSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
